title: FEATURE JOBS: Brand Trade Services, The Conscience Organisation, Doyoueven, Weaving Weblets + More
text:
Are you a graphic designer on the hunt for your next role? You are in luck because Brand Trade Services want a full time Mid Weight Graphic Designer (SYD) to design fashionable homewares products at their Alexandria office. Brand Trade Services sell their on trend quality products in Australia to customers such as Myer, Harris Scarfe, Coles and Bunnings! They are looking for a mid level graphic designer with strong product development capabilities and proven graphic design skills to join their team. The candidate will need to bring with them 3+ years experience in the graphic design industry, strong print production knowledge and a good eye for typography. Interested? Apply here.

The Conscience Organisation, a marketing agency based in Redfern (SYD), are currently hiring a full time Digital Performance & Strategy Manager to manage the digital performance of their clients and contribute to the company’s broader digital strategy. The role includes delivering solutions to clients, managing posts and improving features of online campaigns. The candidate will get the chance to work with partners in the education, beverage, finance, NGO and NPF sectors across the world. Does this sound like the perfect role for you? Then apply now!

Are you a videographer up to date with the latest trends on social media? Do you want to work in a fast paced environment and develop your skill set? Then Doyoueven want you! Doyoueven is a growing active-wear brand looking for a Videographer (MELB) to come and work with them full time! You will need to have experience in using Adobe Suite Specifically Premiere Pro & After Effects and considerable knowledge of video and audio recording equipment. A typical day in this role would include assisting, developing and pitching video concepts for upcoming releases, shooting and editing video content for social and digital platforms and much more! Want to find out more? Click here.

Weaving Weblets want a Social/Digital Marketing Guru to join their team in Newtown (SYD) full time to lead, manage and grow their digital services. Applicants will work with a team of web developers, graphic designers and copywriters to drive all marketing campaigns and assist a variety of clients. You will work on a range of tasks, such as content creation, EDMs, blogging and reporting. You will need 3+ years digital marketing experience, strong communication skills and knowledge of social media advertising. Apply today!

Want more jobs? Check them out below:

Bali Body, a fast growing beauty brand based in Brighton (MELB) are seeking a full time Full Stack Developer. Apply here.



Klara Cosmetics are hiring a full time Ecommerce Sales Co-ordinator (MELB). Apply today.

Big Wolf Marketing are looking for a full time Experienced B2B Appointment Setter (MELB). Apply now.
